mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN H.is_income = 1 THEN H.amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalIncome, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN H.is_income = 0 THEN H.amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalExpenses FROM History H INNER JOIN User U ON U.user_id = H.user_id WHERE U.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(H.date, '%Y-%m') = #{date} AND H.is_delete = 0

SELECT H.history_id AS historyId, C.category_name AS categoryName, H.is_income AS isIncome, H.comment, H.amount, DATE(H.date) AS date FROM History H INNER JOIN User U ON U.user_id = H.user_id LEFT JOIN Category C ON C.category_id = H.category_id WHERE U.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(H.date, '%Y-%m') = #{date} AND H.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY H.date ASC
